title: The Rise of China and the Future of Clean Energy
summary: China has far outpaced the United States in clean energy spending, manufacturing, and innovation. title: Winter Gasoline Shift Pushes U.S. Pump Prices Lower Despite West Coast Spikes
summary: U.S. motorists are getting a reprieve at the pump just as the shift to cheaper winter gasoline begins, with GasBuddy data showing the national average price falling 3.6 cents over the last week to $3.12 per gallon. Diesel also eased 2.6 cents to $3.658. The slide comes as refineries ramp up supply …

title: Natural Gas Becomes Core to Middle East Energy Mix
summary: As global oil majors become more selective with their investments and prioritize shareholder returns, Middle East national oil companies (NOCs) continue to play a pivotal role in global energy security amid shifting market dynamics and the energy transition. title: The Dangerous Myth of Managing Earth’s Climate
summary: A recent piece in New Scientist has reminded me that it is a myth that humans, if they are wise and clever enough, can learn to "manage" the biosphere. title: Musk Buys $1 Billion Tesla Shares After Huge Payout Proposal
summary: Elon Musk bought on Friday shares in Tesla worth about $1 billion, a regulatory filing showed on Monday, just over a week after Tesla’s board proposed an unheard of $1-trillion pay package for the Tesla CEO if the EV maker reaches major production, innovation, and market capitalization goals.
